1.content:
The DWMA is an organization that slays evil souls.

Students are:
Death the Kid
Soul
Maka
Black Star

These students are required to attend. Well, almost everyone.

Death The Kid
Gender: Male
Age: 17
Likes: Shooting with his pinkies
Dislikes: Asymmetry
Privileges: Not Required to attend DWMA (but does so anyway)

The last two seasons were rated TV-14. Since this story is rated E, it SHOULD be rated TV-Y7-FV (if modifications are not made).
1.title: The DWMA

11.content:
Death The Kid's villains include:

A cute puppy (after Death The Kid finds out he lost an eyelash)

Evil souls (because Death The Kid attends DWMA)

Discord (only appears in Friendship is Magic)

Unnamed Cats (only appear in their own show)

Ponies (but they helped him in one episode)

Superior (a grass-like Pokémon)

Beedrill (a bug-type Pokémon)

The game Hey, You! Pikachu!

The show Ned's Newt

Most of these stuff are only mentioned in other media or never mentioned.
11.title: Death The Kid's villains

111.content: Death likes to shoot with his pinkies. Some think he is weird. He could break his pinkies off. He once shot at the wrong time, later compaining his fingers slipped.
111.title: His pinkies

1111.content: Death The Kid rarely bleeds. His most bloodiest bleeds was during a DWMA test in which he passes out after bleeding. This happened because while trying to fix the "K" in "Kid" his paper ripped.
1111.title: He's bleeding!

11111.content: He found Excalibur in a later episode.
11111.title: How he found Excalibur

111111.content: Our story begins in Seiyo, Japan in the year 2007. Death the Kid had a crush on Yaya (I like crossovers) but she was never in the anime. Mizuzu suggested Yaya hang out with her. Mizuzu also introduced Kid to Hiramoni Amu. "Patty! Liz!" Kid said. Bang! Amu was hurt. But she lived. Kid decided to make her symmetrical. Amu replied, "Are you dumb? Haven't you done enough damage already?"
111111.title: Secrets of Egypt

1111111.content: As Mizuzu finds a map, the twosome follow. As they follow, Mizuzu's aunt hears she is with another boy and another girl. Mizuzu sees "Death the Kid's worst influences." "Are you insane?" replied Kid.
1111111.title: Mizuzu finds a map

11111111.content:
Death the Kid saw nightmares!
All of them! He decided to "dine & dash" when suddenly, he bumped into Maka. She said, "This is paradise!" It wasn't. A Beedrill, a Superior, a TV and a game console (N64) running Hey, you, Pikachu!, a ran-by-cats restaurant (store #2), a Discord float, the Ponies, the cute puppy from Soul Eater with a robotic Death the Kid kicking him, and a TV screen playing Ned's Newt all day long. Maka replied, "This place is open until 9pm if the final Ned's Newt doesn't end past closing time. Besides, we put up a float because we don't want your memory wiped out. I do not own this place. For I attend DWMA."
11111111.title: Aah! Real Nightmares!

111111111.content: Finally Mizuzu found a mummy. He said, "Thanks... for NOTHING! I set Mizuzu back up as a trap! And now... Mizuzu is cursed!" Mizuzu began to enlarge. She kept on enlarging. The mummy said, "I need a disguise. For my takeover of Townsville. And you four are going to have a front-row seat!" This is when Liz and Patty returned to human form. Kid didn't wanna face a now-giantess Mizuzu. He didn't want the takeover of Townsville either. Kid was starting to get suspicious. He grew more suspicious as they headed to the U.S.A. He saw Sheldon, Raj and Hilary. "I won't let you take over Townsville," Kid said as he flew past the threesome. Eventually they reached Townsville. Death was so suspicious, he decided to modify the Powerpuff Girls. He added Growth X, Invisible X, and Shrinkage X, but not Antidote X. He added this to bath water and winked at the Professor. The Professor winked back. Kid hid. The Professor called to the girls, "Bathtime!". That was when the water turned blue, just so the girls don't get suspicious.
111111111.title: Mummies or not, Mizuzu?

1111111111.content:
A large earthquake woke up Tommy & Dil Pickles. Phil & Lil woke up as well. Chuckie was the first to wake up, (this occured sometime during All Grown Up's run) and soon Ted & Barney awakened in a flash. Show after show, everyone arrived (which was after the events of Big Bang Theory: Grow Ray.)

Kid: I have known.

Sheldon: We uh... yeah, so, we saw you heading towards Townsville.

That sent everybody laughing. The message was sent to Twilight Sparkle, Fluttershy, Maka, Black Star, Soul, Liz, Patty, Emica (the pop star), Mario, Luigi, Angelica Pickles, Goku, Gohan, Goten, Bulma, Android 18, Freiza, Vegeta, Tim & Moby, Penny, Bernadette, and Amy Farrah Fowler. They were sent laughing themselves silly! (Exception: Tim & Moby.) Death The Kid...
1111111111.title: It worked!

11111111111.content: He realized it all. He flashbacked to the part where Mizuzu became a giantess. Back to the scary park. Back to Asymmetrical Amu. Back to his crush on Yaya. Back to the days of the start of the Timothy Goes To School Inflation story (Soul Eater was mentioned). Back to Kira and Chaz's wedding, which made Kimi Chuckie's sister-in-law. Back to the pilot episode of Digimon. Back to the birth of Dil Pickles. Back to the first episode of Pokemon (Death was 7 at the time). Back to the release of the N64. Back to the premiere of Angry Beavers. Back to Tommy Pickles's first birthday. He didn't remember anything else.
11111111111.title: was aware...

111111111111.content:
Then...

Kid: FRAUD! He's a fraud! The pharoah's a fraud! It's... Mojo Jojo! He grew Mizuzu! He is a criminal and should be arrested!

Sheldon: There was the time Howard and I arrested Pac-Jr.

---Flashback---

White Officer: You are busted! Double Busted! Triple busted!

Black Officer: You're under arrest!

---Present Day---

Kid: Forget Credit Card Numbers and Soda Machines, especially a soda machine serving Coca-Cola! And Hilary! Hot Pockets! Out of all of them to choose from, you chose the worst kind!

---Flashback---

Hilary put down her "Hot Pocket" and walked over to the door.

---Present Day---

Kid: Living on 400 cans of Coke. And a ton of Pepsi! The stuff you drank tasted like Seirra Mist, did it not?

---Flashback---

The liquid tasted sweet and tangy like a Pepsi product.

---Fast Forward---

"This stuff is really effective!" said Hilary.

---Present Day---

Kid: Anorexics! BLEGH! Medication, pills, health stuff is what I describe Wonder Pills.

---Flashback---

Hilary: Why are we at a hangar?

---Present Day---

Kid: What say Robert Irvine?

---Flashback---

Robert: This place is a pigsty!

---Fast Forward---

Robert: You can't eat this stuff! Very Disgusted!

---Back---

Robert: Who's gonna get sick first?

---Present Day---

Cream: I wanna expand!

Kid: Ugh... Bunnies! ANTHRO bunnies! Take Cream and Vanilla, for example. Both are bunnies. Both have different dreams. This is not Meat Or Die! Not The Rifle's Spiral! Not another episode of Dinosaur Office! Sunday Jog is cel-animated. Is it?

---Flashback---

Unknown Dino: All these years, you've been working at Dinosoft Limited. Welcome to Dinosoft Unlimited, where the expectations have no limit.

---Present Day---

Kid: And Ponies! Pony, Pony, Pony, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah! A bunch of Ponies is blah! Too much blah! Rock Lee! Bushy-brows! Blah!
111111111111.title: Realization!

choices: Kid is caught by Twilight Sparkle.
1111111111111.content: Fluttershy and Pinkie Pie both began to drank a can of Coke (5000000000000000000000 calories) and the others of the Mane Six joined in. The mares took big glugs of drink. They started gaining weight. Soon Hilary joined in on the drinking binge! Hilary Duff joined in because one Hilary is never enough! Soon the massive mares reached the ceiling! And the ceiling gave way! Leaving Kid with cuts, scrapes, and broozes. Kid had to clean up.
1111111111111.title: Can of Coca-Cola

11111111111111.content:
Kid was caught by Twilight Sparkle. Then, Timothy said, "I LOVE ANIME NOW!"

Kid was forced to watch anime like Sgt. Frog, One Piece, Pokemon, Dragon Ball Z Kai, Zatch Bell, Shugo Chara, Monster Rancher, Samurai Pizza Cats, Lucky Star, Air, and Sonic X. And Twilight damaged Kid further...
11111111111111.title: Kid is caught by Twilight Sparkle.

111111111111111.content:
Death the Kid realized that this stuff was way over 5 trillion calories. Just one sip will make someone gain 1000 pounds. Twilight drinks it whole anyway, doubling her size. Kid decided to call the Paw Patrol, but he couldn't reach the phone due to Twilight's size. A nuclear weapon was launched. Kid knew she had 200 more cans of that stuff. Twilight was sent into a binge again. Can after Can, her size & height increased. She kept on growing. Kid heard loud footsteps. It was Mizuzu, the gentle (tee-hee) giantess. She said that she wanted to break the curse. The Egyptian... must be destroyed. Twilight already finished her 200th can of Coke. She can resist nukes, and towered over anybody. Not even an Egyptian is the size of...

Kid realized that this is the only way to break Mizuzu's curse... At what cost? Her death... again? Kid finally reached the phone.

Kid: I want 4 helicopters here pronto!

Twilight Sparkle was netted by the Paw Patrol and taken to Mojo's lair.

Kid: Let er' go!

The netting snapped, sending Twilight down, crashing every piece of lair, shrinking in size and height as she fell. When only the floor remained, she was normal size. She crashed into the enlargement machine.

Mizuzu shrank and shrank until she was normal size.
111111111111111.title: She drinks more Coke.

1111111111111111.content: Pinkie Pie made a biggy cake just for Yaya. But Yaya didn't want the cake.
1111111111111111.title: Epilogue

info.description: Death The Kid looks for something symmetrical: Pharaohs.
